pkgmetadata.longdescription: Update and Manipulate Rd Documentation Objects // Functions for manipulation of R documentation objects, including functions reprompt() and ereprompt() for updating 'Rd' documentation for functions, methods and classes; 'Rd' macros for citations and import of references from 'bibtex' files for use in 'Rd' files and 'roxygen2' comments; and many functions for manipulation of references and Rd files.
